name: df-wwlksn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cwwlksn, cmpo(s0, s1, cn0, universe, crab(s2, cfv(cwwlks, cv(s1)), wceq(cfv(chash, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))))
comment: Define the set of all walks (in an undirected graph) of a fixed length n as words over the set of vertices. Such a word corresponds to the sequence p(0) p(1) ... p(n) of the vertices in a walk p(0) e(f(1)) p(1) e(f(2)) ... p(n-1) e(f(n)) p(n) as defined in ~ df-wlks . (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 15-Jul-2018.) (Revised by AV, 8-Apr-2021.)
